channel.title: Do you play modern warfare 2? Look
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N6oRbyAaY3c http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YR8nuIFcTj4 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RhgFjT3M0CM
Check it out, it's not the best. And I'm currently uploading more of this, so please comment and rate.
inb4 camperfag: I don't camp, I just felt like making modern warfare 2 videos.

item.title: Do you play modern warfare 2? Look
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

[quote=“Mr Mopar, post:55, topic:323235”]On highrise go to the side that you can’t get on top of,
then find a ladder that is inside the building.climb up it
and jump to the next platform,its a little camping spot
i found (has a teddy bear)[/quote]

On google go to the left side you can’t find it if you’re blind,
it will list websites you can click.hopefully they are grammar
and then read it,its a little trick
i found (has helpful stuff on it)

Read full topic
item.source: Do you play modern warfare 2? Look

item.title: Do you play modern warfare 2? Look
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote="`Lewk_, post:52, topic:323235"][quote author=Frell link=topic=419632.msg3093047#msg3093047 date=1263059178]
I love how people think its a glitch. Infinity ward said if you make it into a secret spot, there will be a teddybear to let you know it is not a glitch. At the top of that building there are about 7.

And everythings lined up so cleanly it cannot be a glitch, BECAUSE IT ISNT!
[/quote]
I never classified it as a glitch, it’s called glitches AND camping spots, which means I’ll be posting glitches TOO, but I haven’t got to it?[/quote]

You can’t glitch off the map, once you do the game ends becaise the players origin is not part of the map. Plus most of these are just nooby camping spots.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you play modern warfare 2? Look

I love how people think its a glitch. Infinity ward said if you make it into a secret spot, there will be a teddybear to let you know it is not a glitch. At the top of that building there are about 7.

And everythings lined up so cleanly it cannot be a glitch, BECAUSE IT ISNT!
[/quote]
I never classified it as a glitch, it’s called glitches AND camping spots, which means I’ll be posting glitches TOO, but I haven’t got to it?[/quote]

[quote=“Explisionist, post:45, topic:323235”][quote author=Frell link=topic=419632.msg3092484#msg3092484 date=1262999781]
Still not a glitch.
[/quote]
Glitch= getting some place they don’t want you going… Its their stupidity for putting that crap there… So technically it is a glitch.[/quote]

Is pretty much who i was talking to

item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

xxlukexx:

i can never make the jump, so hard…

Try jumping before you hit the side of the building, because when you run you run on top of the ridge of the building which slows you down when jumping.

item.title: Do you play modern warfare 2? Look
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

Frell:

HAHAHAHA at ‘sticking to the side of the rail’ on the highrise shit. You climb up the side of it like a ladder because thats what you would be able to do in real life.

Cool, by sticking to the side I meant by sticking to the part where theres no place to grip what so ever. How could you climb a flat surface…? Sticking to the part with the yellow (The railing) makes you fall off almost instantly when you get to the top…
Where you fall:

2ufvl6v.jpg933×476

Where you don’t fall:
22nb68.jpg952×479

Read full topic

item.source: Do you play modern warfare 2? Look

item.title: Do you play modern warfare 2? Look
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

I got lvl 49 in 13 hours of playing time… I got lvl 70 and 8 prestige in 5 days of playing time… Currently on a new account at lvl 50… I mastered all my beginning guns= the exp to get u lvling faster…

Think about it, you level faster from actually mastering weapons then just killing people… I average 20+ kills a game, along with unlocking new stuff for guns…

also a few tips… Kill 2 people in each spot, they will tell ppl on their team where u are at, and they will go behind you… Happens a lot.

Best thing to use for head shots on a gun = red dot.
Acog= best for far distance…

I use the acr and m16 with ranger akimbos and fmj… Kick ass eh?

Xbox360 gamertag= Kill Fame

Thats my account i am lvling on atm… the lvl 70 with 8 prestige is a friends account that I leveled up for him then i stopped paying for live and gave it to him… Add me anytime I will play all games besides domination

Read full topic
item.source: Do you play modern warfare 2? Look

item.title: Do you play modern warfare 2? Look
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

There were no glitches whatsoever in your videos. In cod 4 here were spots like these, then treyarch fucked it up by removing them all. Infinity ward then made a promise to add more of these spots.

HAHAHAHA at ‘sticking to the side of the rail’ on the highrise shit. You climb up the side of it like a ladder because thats what you would be able to do in real life.

Read full topic
